code: import React from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import"./Categories.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function categories(){var categories=[{name:'all',text:'all'},{name:'electronics',text:'electronics'},{name:'jewelery',text:'jewelery'},{name:'men',text:'men'},{name:'men"s clothing ',text:'men"s clothing '}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"categories",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:categories.map(function(c,idx){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:c.name==='all'?'/shop':"/shop/".concat(c.name),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:c.text})})},idx);})})});}
